title: Academic Listening Test 4 — Global Perspectives
transcript: The first recording is a conversation with a travel consultant. The second is a briefing for international volunteers. The third captures postgraduate students reviewing fieldwork plans. The final recording is a lecture on sustainable tourism.

questions.prompt: Which destination does the customer finally select?
What is the departure date requested?
Which airline offers the best baggage allowance?
How many nights will the traveller stay?
Which add-on service does the customer decline?
What is the maximum luggage weight allowed in kilograms?
Which vaccination certificate must volunteers show?
Which local partner organisation coordinates housing?
How many teaching kits should each team carry?
Which app should volunteers use to log their work?
How many villages will the students survey?
Which data collection tool do they adopt?
Which supervisor will review the ethics protocol?
What contingency item do they add to the budget?
How many days will be spent in the capital for training?
Which principle is emphasised as essential for community-led tourism?
What percentage of visitor fees does the lecturer say should support conservation?
Which island is used as a case study of coral reef recovery?
How many years did it take to restore the mangrove park mentioned?
Which technology is highlighted for tracking tourist flows?
